label: ID_photovoltaic_electricity_source
comment: The "ID_photovoltaic_electricity_source" the investment option of a photovoltaic system with a maximum capacity of 20 kW. The load profile is automatically calculated based on the given parameters. Beside the green ones, the blue columns are relevant for this component. Several parameters such as the location, azimuth and tilt of the modules are individually defined. Technical parameters of the module and the inverter are automatically obtained from a coupled database.

label: ID_solar_thermal_source
comment: The "ID_solar_thermal_source" represents the investment option of a solar thermal system with a maximum capacity of 20 kW. The load profile is automatically calculated based on the given parameters. Beside the green ones, the blue columns are relevant for this component. Several parameters such as the location and otientation of the modules are defined, as well as technical parameters of the system.

label: wind_turbine
comment: The "wind_turbine" source represents the investment option of a wind turbine with a maximum capacity of 30 kW. This component is deactivated and will not be considered during the modeling process. The load profile is automatically calculated based on the given parameters. Beside the green ones, the red columns are relevant for this component. Several parameters such as the hub hight are defined. Technical parameters of the turbine model are automatically obtained from a coupled data base.
